Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Overland Drive, south of the Guard Headquarters.
Room.LongDescription: The City Guard Crime Patrol Headquarters is located to the north of Overland Drive. Two large guards patrol the entrance and you can see a number of city guards leave to patrol the streets. The guards at the front entrance are looking at you funny as you continue to stare at them. Main Street is to the east of here. On the south side of the street is the Dragon Tooth Inn, an exclusive inn for the discriminating visitor. The entrance is to the west.
